name: Drawz
description: As a digitalized version of the chalk and black chalkboard that we knew from our old school years, Drawz is an oldskool puzzle game with 45 levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: Is your computer older than ten years? You should probably get a new computer before you consider more games.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: Is your computer older than ten years? You should probably get a new computer before you consider more games.
